description: The Canadian Department of National Defence / Royal Canadian Air Force (DND/RCAF) has a requirement for bundled services for Complete Repair & Overhaul of Pratt & Whitney PT6A-27 turboprop aero engines, associated components and accessories including Technical Investigation and Engineering Support (TIES) and PT6A-27 Publication Revision Services. The RCAF operates a fleet of four CC138 Twin Otter aircraft for light transport at 440 Transport Squadron, Yellowknife, N.W.T. The department owns a total of twelve engines to support this fleet: eight in service, four spares, one dedicated as a non-flyable tech trainer and one engine reduced to spare parts and held by CFSS.
full_summary:
======================================
**Notice: Request for Proposal (RFP) for Complete Repair and Overhaul of PT6A-27 Turboprop Aero Engines**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS4243289159
**Solicitation Number:** WS4243289159
**Publication Date:** May 27, 2024
**Closing Date:** July 30, 2024 @ 14:00:00

**Notice Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for bundled services to support the Complete Repair and Overhaul of Pratt & Whitney PT6A-27 turboprop aero engines, associated components, and accessories. The services include Technical Investigation and Engineering Support (TIES) and PT6A-27 Publication Revision Services.

**Operational Context:**
The Royal Canadian Air Force operates a fleet of four CC138 Twin Otter aircraft for light transport at 440 Transport Squadron, Yellowknife, Northwest Territories. The department owns a total of twelve PT6A-27 engines to support this fleet.

**Requirements:**
The proposal should include the following services:

* Complete Repair and Overhaul of PT6A-27 turboprop aero engines
* Technical Investigation and Engineering Support (TIES)
* PT6A-27 Publication Revision Services

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposals will be evaluated based on the Lowest Cost-per-Point method.

**Contract Type: Services**
The contract will be a Service-Based contract.

**Location:**
The services will be performed at the 440 Transport Squadron, Yellowknife, Northwest Territories.

**Language of Contract:**
English and/or French. Bilingual services may be required.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Aida Ghoddosei (elle-la / she-her) at aida.ghoddosei@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**URL of the Notice:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19811733?extsite=MTk4MTE3MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: the Canadian government publications are typically in both English and French languages; therefore, I have translated the administrative terms and offered the texts in both official languages accordingly.
